statements: DELETE FROM users WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM users WHERE education_level = 'Bachelor' AND (age < 25 OR age > 40);
DELETE FROM users WHERE gender = 'Female' AND (education_level = 'Master' OR education_level = 'PhD') AND age >= 30;
DELETE FROM personalized_learning_paths WHERE student_id = 2 AND course_id = 3;
DELETE FROM personalized_learning_paths WHERE student_id = 1 AND completion_status = true;
DELETE FROM personalized_learning_paths WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM student_preferences WHERE preferred_learning_style = 'Visual');
DELETE FROM student_preferences WHERE id NOT IN (SELECT student_id FROM personalized_learning_paths);
DELETE FROM courses WHERE instructor = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM student_performance WHERE student_id = 1 AND course_id = 101;
DELETE FROM students WHERE age < 18 AND grade_level = 'High School';
DELETE FROM courses WHERE course_level = 'Intermediate' OR course_level = 'Advanced';
DELETE FROM Enrollments WHERE student_id = 1 AND course_id = 101;
